topic.title: Children Teenagers and Young Adults Cancer Care Spell
topic.shortdesc: A Children, Teenagers and Young Adults Cancer Care Spell is a continuous period of care, including assessment for care, for a child, teenager and young adult who has been diagnosed as suffering from cancer.
